game.name: Transit World
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Lead your transport company to success: manage people, vehicles, and finances, take on jobs or drive yourself – Transit World combines management depth with freedom.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Lead your transport company to success: manage people, vehicles, and finances, take on jobs or drive yourself – Transit World combines management depth with freedom.
